body.name: Dresser for Bedroom, Modern White Dresser with 6 Drawers, Wide Chest of Drawers with Gold Handles
features: Elegant and Delicate Design: Our white dresser features a delicate and elegant design that adds a touch of sophistication to your bedroom decor. The two metal circle handles on each drawer provide a stylish and unique accent, creating a visually appealing piece of furniture.

Ample Storage Space: With six spacious drawers, our dresser offers ample storage space for all your clothing, accessories, and personal belongings. Keep your bedroom organized and clutter-free with designated compartments for different items.

Versatile Bedroom Essential: Designed specifically for the bedroom, our white dresser seamlessly blends functionality and style. Its versatile nature allows it to fit well in various bedroom settings, adding a beautiful focal point while providing essential storage capabilities.

High-Quality Construction: Crafted with utmost attention to detail, our 6-drawer dresser is made from high-quality materials to ensure durability and longevity. The sturdy construction guarantees stability and strength, making it a reliable investment for your bedroom.

Easy Assembly and Care: Our white dresser is designed with ease of use in mind. It comes with simple assembly instructions and all necessary hardware, allowing you to quickly set it up without hassle. Additionally, the white finish is easy to clean and maintain, ensuring your dresser stays looking pristine with minimal effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Six Drawers Included
reviews.reviewText: This dresser measures about 2.5 feet tall, almost 4 feet wide, and a little more than a foot deep. It is made of metal and engineered wood. It has a white tone and is perfect for a guest room or a room for a young child. This is extremely durable, simple to maintain, and built to last.The dresser has a sophisticated appearance because of its gold-colored handles. A beautiful and eye-catching touch, the two metal circular knobs on each drawer help to make the piece of furniture really pop. This, in my opinion, would make a fantastic focal point for a room.The six provided drawers are perfect for storing all the clothing. There is enough space to arrange the drawers effortlessly, keeping your items uncluttered and easy to locate. This dresser's construction was done with durable, robust materials. It does come in a box and needs to be assembled, but all the necessary hardware and step-by-step instructions are included.Although it appears high-end and fancy, this item is reasonably priced. It adds a sense of elegance to any space. This dresser is beautiful, high-quality, and I couldn't be happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: I received this dresser with missing parts so I contacted customer service and they got back to me in less than 24hours. I received a whole new dresser within the week. There was some damage to some parts but that could have occurred with delivery and once put together I couldn’t see it. It’s super simple to put together. Very cute and perfect for our baby nursery!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After hours of putting this together, hopeful that the damaged parts wouldn’t show once put together, they unfortunately do. One of the drawers doesn’t sit right, nothing we do will fix it and make it flush with the other drawers on the same side. I suppose you get what you pay for with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really cute but smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: Overall it’s really cute and sturdy for the price. Assembly was easy but took forever! So many screws and pieces. Also some of the drawers are crooked which really bothers me. Also the drawers are smaller than I expected you can’t fit a ton of clothes in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very small drawers
reviews.reviewText: The drawers are very small. Cant fit too many clothes in them. But good quality. The drawer would be good for kids clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dresser for Bedroom
reviews.reviewText: The sleek lines and appealing simplicity of this piece completely revamped the appearance of my bedroom in an instant. While the gold knobs on each drawer provide a stylish contrast and contribute to the overall luxury atmosphere, the white finish lends an air of elegance to the piece of furniture. It is an easy complement to the furniture and décor that are already in my bedroom, and it helps to tie the entire area together in a way that is visually pleasing. The dresser has a surprising amount of space inside. I now have sufficient storage space for all of my apparel and accessories thanks to the fact that my dresser has six drawers of varying sizes. Because the drawers move so easily down their tracks, it is not difficult at all for me to get to my items. I am able to easily organise my belongings and stack them on top of each other since the drawers have the perfect amount of depth. Because this dresser has such a large capacity, I no longer have to worry about my bedroom being cluttered with unnecessary items. The quality of the work that was put into it was one feature that really jumped out to me. The dresser gives the impression of being sturdy and well-built, which gives me confidence in its longevity. The structure is solid, and the components that were used to make it are of a high standard. It is clear to me that this dresser was constructed with durability in mind, which is vital for a piece of furniture that is used on a regular basis. The assembly process was shockingly easy and uncomplicated. The kit featured easy-to-understand instructions as well as all of the required hardware and components. I was successful in quickly putting it together by exercising some patience and attentively following the step-by-step instructions provided. Additionally, the dresser has anti-tip hardware, which is a considerate innovation that contributes to increased safety and stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cutest dresser
reviews.reviewText: This one came a little damaged but we have bought before and its super cute, perfect for my toddlers room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Instructions seem off. For the inside brackets we had to switch them around when building it and each drawer has its own specific spot so if it doesn’t quiet fit the first time I suggest trying another spot but overall super cute took about 2 and a half hours to complete.
